0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'violence', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity', 'hospital')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(TV)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%'
    AND t.production_year > 1950
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
1:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
  AND cn.name = 'DreamWorks Animation'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link ='features'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(200%)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(worldwide)%'
    AND t.production_year > 2000
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
2:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'murder-in-title', 'blood', 'violence')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(USA)%'
  AND mc.note LIKE '%(200%)%'
    AND t.production_year > 2014
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

        link_type AS lt,

        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follows%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(200%)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(worldwide)%'
    AND t.production_year >2000 AND (t.title LIKE 'Birdemic%' OR t.title LIKE '%Movie%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[nl]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('superhero', 'sequel', 'second-part', 'marvel-comics', 'based-on-comic', 'tv-special', 'fight', 'violence')
    AND lt.link ='features'
    AND mc.note IS NULL
    AND t.production_year > 2005
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
6:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code !='[pl]' AND (cn.name LIKE '20th Century Fox%' OR cn.name LIKE 'Twentieth Century Fox%')
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link ='features'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(VHS)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(1994)%'
    AND t.production_year > 2014
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
7:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
  AND cn.name = 'DreamWorks Animation'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('superhero', 'marvel-comics', 'based-on-comic', 'tv-special', 'fight', 'violence', 'magnet', 'web', 'claw', 'laser')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(USA)%'
  AND mc.note LIKE '%(200%)%'
    AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2006 AND 2007 AND (t.title LIKE 'One Piece%' OR t.title LIKE 'Dragon Ball Z%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
8:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword = 'computer-animation'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Japan)%' AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(USA)%' AND (mc.note LIKE '%(2006)%' OR mc.note LIKE '%(2007)%')
    AND t.production_year > 2014
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
9:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.name LIKE 'Lionsgate%'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity')
    AND lt.link IN ('references', 'referenced in', 'features', 'featured in')
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Japan)%' AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(USA)%'
    AND t.production_year >2010
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[jp]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='character-name-in-title'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NULL
    AND t.production_year > 1990
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id

12:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code = '[ru]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NOT NULL AND (mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' OR mc.note LIKE '%(worldwide)%')
    AND t.title != '' AND (t.title LIKE '%Champion%' OR t.title LIKE '%Loser%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
